name: PlanningCenterChecks
description: A simple use of the Planning Centre Online API to query for data that hasn't been input correctly.

PCO_KEY.description: The Planning Center Online API OAuth 1.0a consumer key.

PCO_SECRET.description: The Planning Center Online API key OAuth 1.0a secret.

SESSION_SECRET.description: The secret used for cookie session storage

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of Unicorn (web server) processes to run.
